entry.title: MVP框架示例讲解
entry.content:
源码传送门：

MVP
此文是在基础上做的讲解,用于加深对此框架的印象

主要代码介绍

MActivity.class

抽象MActivity代码

BaseActivity.class

BaseActivity继承MActivity

应用的MainActivity继承BaseActivity
MainActivity.class

MService.class

抽象MService

BaseService.class

BaseService继承自MService

应用的TestService继承BaseService
TestService.class

BasePresenter.class

Presenter.class

Presenter则继承BasePresenter

启动流程：

MainActivity启动

创建时会创建并持有一个Presenter
Presenter.class

Presenter构建方法中会持有单例model
Presenter.class

紧接着调用Presenter的onCreate会将View传入Model
Presenter.class

添加到Model的Views集合
Model.class

打印如下

此时单例Model和Activity的Presenter就创建起来，Model中的生产出的值就会通过接口传出到Activity中
紧接着Activity启动并绑定Service

Service启动

同理过程中也会创建一个Service的Presenter，紧接着Presenter也会把View添加到单例model的Views中

此时MVP框架的应用就创建完成，此时存活着一个Activity和对应的Presenter，一个Service和对应的Presenter，一个Model

运行

Model中生产的值通过遍历View分别传出
Model.class
我简单创建了一个Handler，每秒+1，并值传出来


该值首先会通过View传到对应的Presenter，紧接着传出到实现了View方法的Activity和Service

收到来着Model的数据
MVP的特性才展现出来
打印如下

灵活添加和移除view

移除

当Activity销毁时，通过onDestroy的方法除Model中对应Presenter的View，防止泄漏
Model.class

打印如下：

添加

当Activity再次创建时，model中会再增加其新的对应Presenter的View


当不再有Presenter持有Model时，Model会被释放
Model.class

补充BaseActivity和BaseService

是属于逻辑层的两个方法，用于逻辑与界面分离时，当逻辑层添加了新的接口时，界面并不需要，或者没来得及实现时，在逻辑层的BaseActivity和BaseService中添加了接口，界面层就不需要去实现。

entry.title: Hexo-Theme-Snail
entry.content:
hexo-theme-snail

View Hexo-Theme-Snail Sources On Github ➾

View Live Super Snail Blog ➾

Hexo-theme-snail is a succinct hexo theme. It has two colors, light and star, that can be set according to your own preferences in the settings, and also has the functions of sharing and commenting. More features are under development.

Features

  • light color theme and star theme
  • diversified comment system
  • notice tips
  • share to other platforms (under development)
  • picture sharing (under development)

Quick Start

Install Hexo

Setup your blog

Installation Theme

Set Theme

Modify the value of theme: in _config.yml

Start the Server

Configuration

Site

Replace the following information with your own.

Site Settings

Put customized pictures in img directory.

SNS Settings

If you don’t want to display it, you can delete it directly.

Sidebar Settings

Theme

Deployment

Comment

See httpymls://github.com/imsun/gitment for detailed configuration method.

Tip

Color Sheme

Set the enable value of the desired color sheme to true. If the value of bg_effects.star.enable is true, please modify the value of highlight_theme in ./themes/snail/_config.yml to night.

Releases

V1.0

  • fix the bugs
  • add comment system
  • add notice tips
  • add star sheme

License

Apache License 2.0 Copyright(c) 2018-2020 Dusign
